title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 5-1.20 - Applicability
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 5-1.20 - Applicability

State Regulations

The provisions of sections
5-1.20
through
5-1.33
of this Subpart shall apply to all public water systems, provided the systems serve 15 or more service connections or serve 25 or more persons. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
§§
5-1.20

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
